verses.verse: But the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> committed <S%H4603><s%> a trespass <S%H4604><s%> in the accursed <S%H2764><s%> thing: for Achan, <S%H5912><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Carmi, <S%H3756><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Zabdi, <S%H2067><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Zerah, <S%H2226><s%> of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Judah, <S%H3063><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> of the accursed <S%H2764><s%> thing: and the anger <S%H639><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> was kindled <S%H2734><s%> against the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

And Joshua <S%H3091><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> men <S%H582><s%> from Jericho <S%H3405><s%> to Ai, <S%H5857><s%> which <S%H834><s%> is beside <S%H5973><s%> Bethaven, <S%H1007><s%> on the east <S%H6924><s%> of Bethel, <S%H1008><s%> and spoke <S%H559><s%> to them, saying, <S%H559><s%> Go <S%H5927><s%> up and view <S%H7270><s%> the country. <S%H776><s%> And the men <S%H582><s%> went <S%H5927><s%> up and viewed <S%H7270><s%> Ai. <S%H5857><s%>

And they returned <S%H7725><s%> to Joshua, <S%H3091><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> to him, Let not all <S%H3605><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> go <S%H5927><s%> up; but let about two or <S%H176><s%> three <S%H7969><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> men <S%H376><s%> go <S%H5927><s%> up and smite <S%H5217><s%> Ai; <S%H5857><s%> and make not all <S%H3605><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> to labor <S%H3021><s%> thither; <S%H8033><s%> for they are but few. <S%H4592><s%>

So there went <S%H5927><s%> up thither <S%H8033><s%> of the people <S%H5971><s%> about three <S%H7969><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> men: <S%H376><s%> and they fled <S%H5127><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the men <S%H582><s%> of Ai. <S%H5857><s%>

And the men <S%H582><s%> of Ai <S%H5857><s%> smote <S%H5221><s%> of them about thirty <S%H7970><s%> and six <S%H8337><s%> men: <S%H376><s%> for they chased <S%H7291><s%> them from before <S%H6440><s%> the gate <S%H8179><s%> even to Shebarim, <S%H7671><s%> and smote <S%H5221><s%> them in the going <S%H4174><s%> down: <S%H4174><s%> why the hearts <S%H3824><s%> of the people <S%H5971><s%> melted, <S%H4549><s%> and became <S%H1961><s%> as water. <S%H4325><s%>

And Joshua <S%H3091><s%> rent <S%H7167><s%> his clothes, <S%H8071><s%> and fell <S%H5307><s%> to the earth <S%H776><s%> on his face <S%H6440><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> the eventide, <S%H6153><s%> he and the elders <S%H2205><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and put <S%H5927><s%> dust <S%H6083><s%> on their heads. <S%H7218><s%>

And Joshua <S%H3091><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> Alas, <S%H162><s%> O LORD <S%H136><s%> God, <S%H3069><s%> why <S%H4100><s%> have you at all brought <S%H5674><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> people <S%H5971><s%> over <S%H5674><s%> Jordan, <S%H3383><s%> to deliver <S%H5414><s%> us into the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the Amorites, <S%H567><s%> to destroy <S%H6><s%> us? would <S%H3863><s%> to God we had been content, <S%H2974><s%> and dwelled <S%H3427><s%> on the other <S%H5676><s%> side <S%H5676><s%> Jordan! <S%H3383><s%>

O LORD, <S%H136><s%> what <S%H4100><s%> shall I say, <S%H559><s%> when <S%H6310><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> turns <S%H2015><s%> their backs <S%H6203><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> their enemies! <S%H341><s%>

For the Canaanites <S%H3669><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> shall hear <S%H8085><s%> of it, and shall environ <S%H5437><s%> us round, <S%H5921><s%> and cut <S%H3772><s%> off our name <S%H8034><s%> from the earth: <S%H776><s%> and what <S%H4100><s%> will you do <S%H6213><s%> to your great <S%H1419><s%> name? <S%H8034><s%>
And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Joshua, <S%H3091><s%> Get <S%H6965><s%> you up; why <S%H4100><s%> lie <S%H5307><s%> you thus <S%H2088><s%> on your face? <S%H6440><s%>

Israel <S%H3478><s%> has sinned, <S%H2398><s%> and they have also <S%H1571><s%> transgressed <S%H5674><s%> my covenant <S%H1285><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I commanded <S%H6680><s%> them: for they have even <S%H1571><s%> taken <S%H3947><s%> of the accursed <S%H2764><s%> thing, and have also <S%H1571><s%> stolen, <S%H1589><s%> and dissembled <S%H3584><s%> also, <S%H1571><s%> and they have put <S%H7760><s%> it even <S%H1571><s%> among their own stuff. <S%H3627><s%>

Therefore the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> could <S%H3201><s%> not stand <S%H6965><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> their enemies, <S%H341><s%> but turned <S%H6437><s%> their backs <S%H6203><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> their enemies, <S%H341><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> they were accursed: <S%H2764><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> will I be with you any more, <S%H3254><s%> except <S%H518><s%> <S%H3808><s%> you destroy <S%H8045><s%> the accursed <S%H2764><s%> from among <S%H7130><s%> you.

Up, sanctify <S%H6942><s%> the people, <S%H5971><s%> and say, <S%H559><s%> Sanctify <S%H6942><s%> yourselves against to morrow: <S%H4279><s%> for thus <S%H3541><s%> said <S%H559><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> God <S%H430><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> There is an accursed <S%H2764><s%> thing in the middle <S%H7130><s%> of you, O Israel: <S%H3478><s%> you can <S%H3201><s%> not stand <S%H6965><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> your enemies, <S%H341><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> you take <S%H5493><s%> away the accursed <S%H2764><s%> thing from among <S%H7130><s%> you.

In the morning <S%H1242><s%> therefore you shall be brought <S%H7126><s%> according to your tribes: <S%H7626><s%> and it shall be, that the tribe <S%H7626><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> takes <S%H3920><s%> shall come <S%H7126><s%> according to the families <S%H4940><s%> thereof; and the family <S%H4940><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> shall take <S%H3920><s%> shall come <S%H7126><s%> by households; <S%H1004><s%> and the household <S%H1004><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> shall take <S%H3920><s%> shall come <S%H7126><s%> man <S%H1397><s%> by man. <S%H1397><s%>

And it shall be, that he that is taken <S%H3920><s%> with the accursed <S%H2764><s%> thing shall be burnt <S%H8313><s%> with fire, <S%H784><s%> he and all <S%H3605><s%> that he has: because <S%H3588><s%> he has transgressed <S%H5674><s%> the covenant <S%H1285><s%> of the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> and because <S%H3588><s%> he has worked <S%H6213><s%> folly <S%H5039><s%> in Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

So Joshua <S%H3091><s%> rose <S%H7925><s%> up early <S%H7925><s%> in the morning, <S%H1242><s%> and brought <S%H7126><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> by their tribes; <S%H7626><s%> and the tribe <S%H7626><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> was taken: <S%H3920><s%>

And he brought <S%H7126><s%> the family <S%H4940><s%> of Judah; <S%H3063><s%> and he took <S%H3920><s%> the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Zarhites: <S%H2227><s%> and he brought <S%H7126><s%> the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Zarhites <S%H2227><s%> man <S%H1397><s%> by man; <S%H1397><s%> and Zabdi <S%H2067><s%> was taken: <S%H3920><s%>

And he brought <S%H7126><s%> his household <S%H1004><s%> man <S%H1397><s%> by man; <S%H1397><s%> and Achan, <S%H5912><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Carmi, <S%H3756><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Zabdi, <S%H2067><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Zerah, <S%H2226><s%> of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Judah, <S%H3063><s%> was taken. <S%H3920><s%>

And Joshua <S%H3091><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Achan, <S%H5912><s%> My son, <S%H1121><s%> give, <S%H7760><s%> I pray <S%H4994><s%> you, glory <S%H3519><s%> to the LORD <S%H3068><s%> God <S%H430><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and make <S%H5414><s%> confession <S%H8426><s%> to him; and tell <S%H5046><s%> me now <S%H4994><s%> what <S%H4100><s%> you have done; <S%H6213><s%> hide <S%H3582><s%> it not from me.

And Achan <S%H5912><s%> answered <S%H6030><s%> Joshua, <S%H3091><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> Indeed <S%H546><s%> I have sinned <S%H2398><s%> against the LORD <S%H3068><s%> God <S%H430><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and thus <S%H2063><s%> and thus <S%H2063><s%> have I done: <S%H6213><s%>

When I saw <S%H7200><s%> among the spoils <S%H7998><s%> a goodly <S%H2896><s%> Babylonish <S%H8152><s%> garment, <S%H155><s%> and two hundred <S%H3967><s%> shekels <S%H8255><s%> of silver, <S%H3701><s%> and a wedge <S%H3956><s%> of gold <S%H2091><s%> of fifty <S%H2572><s%> shekels <S%H8255><s%> weight, <S%H4948><s%> then I coveted <S%H2530><s%> them, and took <S%H3947><s%> them; and, behold, <S%H2009><s%> they are hid <S%H2934><s%> in the earth <S%H776><s%> in the middle <S%H8432><s%> of my tent, <S%H168><s%> and the silver <S%H3701><s%> under <S%H8478><s%> it.

So Joshua <S%H3091><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> messengers, <S%H4397><s%> and they ran <S%H7323><s%> to the tent; <S%H168><s%> and, behold, <S%H2009><s%> it was hid <S%H2934><s%> in his tent, <S%H168><s%> and the silver <S%H3701><s%> under <S%H8478><s%> it.

And they took <S%H3947><s%> them out of the middle <S%H8432><s%> of the tent, <S%H168><s%> and brought <S%H935><s%> them to Joshua, <S%H3091><s%> and to all <S%H3605><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and laid <S%H3332><s%> them out before <S%H6440><s%> the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

And Joshua, <S%H3091><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> with him, took <S%H3947><s%> Achan <S%H5912><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Zerah, <S%H2226><s%> and the silver, <S%H3701><s%> and the garment, <S%H155><s%> and the wedge <S%H3956><s%> of gold, <S%H2091><s%> and his sons, <S%H1121><s%> and his daughters, <S%H1323><s%> and his oxen, <S%H7794><s%> and his asses, <S%H2543><s%> and his sheep, <S%H6629><s%> and his tent, <S%H168><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> that he had: and they brought <S%H5927><s%> them to the valley <S%H6010><s%> of Achor. <S%H5911><s%>

And Joshua <S%H3091><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> Why <S%H4100><s%> have you troubled <S%H5916><s%> us? the LORD <S%H3068><s%> shall trouble <S%H5916><s%> you this <S%H2088><s%> day. <S%H3117><s%> And all <S%H3605><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> stoned <S%H5619><s%> him with stones, <S%H68><s%> and burned <S%H8313><s%> them with fire, <S%H784><s%> after they had stoned <S%H7275><s%> them with stones. <S%H68><s%>

And they raised <S%H6965><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> him a great <S%H1419><s%> heap <S%H1530><s%> of stones <S%H68><s%> to this <S%H2088><s%> day. <S%H3117><s%> So the LORD <S%H3068><s%> turned <S%H7725><s%> from the fierceness <S%H2740><s%> of his anger. <S%H639><s%> Why <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3651><s%> the name <S%H8034><s%> of that place <S%H4725><s%> was called, <S%H7121><s%> The valley <S%H6010><s%> of Achor, <S%H5911><s%> to this <S%H2088><s%> day. <S%H3117><s%>
